import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { ListGroup,Form, Button, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import Payment from '../components/Payment' import {savePaymentMethod} from '../actions/orderActions' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const PaymentScreen = ({match,history}) => { const selectedSub = useSelector(state => state.selectedSub) const {subItem} = selectedSub const dispatch = useDispatch() const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('PayPal') const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)) console.log(paymentMethod) history.push('/placeorder') } return (
Go Back
Select Method setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} >
) } export default PaymentScreen
